format: JavaScript (React-like syntax with LightningJS components and template syntax)
description: A source file defining a Sidebar component for a web UI, implementing tabs and elements for tools and templates, leveraging LightningJS framework and custom theme/store integrations.

classes.name: Sidebar
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a sidebar with tabs and tool/template options.

methods.name: $addText
methods.description: Adds a text element using store plugin.

methods.name: $addButton
methods.description: Adds a button element via store plugin.

methods.name: $addImage
methods.description: Adds an image element via store plugin.

methods.name: $addSection
methods.description: Adds a section element via store plugin.

methods.name: $tplHero
methods.description: Loads the 'Hero' template via store plugin.

methods.name: $tplTwoCol
methods.description: Loads the 'Two-column' template via store plugin.
